rubric: Chilly patient: always feels cold even in warm weather

notes: Classical chilly constitution; often slow metabolism and shy nature

rubric: Hot patient: cannot tolerate heat, always wants cold
modality: Worse in sun, closed rooms, warm bath; better from cool air
notes: Very reactive, irritable, energetic patients

rubric: Wants head cool but body warm
modality: Uncovers head even during fever
notes: Seen in fevers, children, or inflammatory states

rubric: Aversion to cold bathing
modality: Worse after exposure to cold water
notes: Seen in weak or sensitive constitutions

rubric: Desire for open air even when chilly
modality: Wants fresh air despite cold sensitivity
notes: Contradictory thermal state; emotional or hormonal link

rubric: Cannot bear covering during fever
modality: Wants to be uncovered even if shivering
notes: Common in high-grade fevers and sudden congestion

rubric: Sensitive to cold wind or draft

notes: Often seen in respiratory or joint complaints

rubric: Wants warm drinks, even in summer

rubric: Feels hot in hands and feet, seeks cold exposure

notes: Often seen in menopausal, hyperthyroid, or restless patients

rubric: Wants cold water even in chills

notes: Contrary thermal state indicating intense thirst

rubric: Chilly patient with craving for cold food and drinks

notes: Contradictory thermal traits; often hormonal or emotional

rubric: Hot patient yet dislikes cold food

notes: Hot outside, cold inside pattern

rubric: Wants fan directly on face

notes: Seen in congestive states, fevers, or anxiety

rubric: Wants to be wrapped up even in summer
modality: Always feels cold irrespective of season
notes: Deep chilly diathesis; weak vitality and fear of draft

rubric: One-sided heat sensation

rubric: Feet cold in bed, must find warm spot

notes: Classic in poor circulation and hormonal states

rubric: Burning of palms and soles at night
modality: Must uncover or place on cold surface
notes: Common in menopausal women, diabetic patients

rubric: Cannot tolerate cold wind on face

notes: Sensitive respiratory or nervous systems

rubric: Hot flushes with aversion to warm covering

rubric: Desire to walk in open air regardless of cold
modality: Feels better mentally and physically when outdoors
notes: Air hunger; emotional relief with movement

rubric: Cannot bear heat of sun

notes: Seen in sunstroke, hypertension, or climacteric states

rubric: Chilly patient worse before menses

notes: Chilly thermal combined with hormonal disturbance

rubric: Wants cold application on head during headache
modality: Head feels hot, better from cool compress or wind

rubric: Better from wrapping up warmly
modality: All complaints better with warmth or heat packs
notes: Chilly diathesis, extreme sensitivity to cold

rubric: Heat flushes ascending from chest to head
modality: Worse at night or on excitement

rubric: Cold hands with hot head

notes: Seen in acute fevers and children’s complaints

rubric: Desires to lie uncovered despite being cold

notes: Seen in collapse, coma, or severe nervous disorders

rubric: Complaints from exposure to cold damp
modality: Triggers joint, urinary, or respiratory symptoms
notes: Classic in rheumatic or post-rainfall aggravation

rubric: Worse in closed or stuffy rooms
modality: Desires windows open, feels suffocated
notes: Fresh air ameliorates both mental and physical complaints

rubric: Chilly spine or back despite warm weather
modality: Wants heat on back even in summer

rubric: Worse from uncovering any part
modality: Uncovering even a finger worsens symptoms
notes: Extreme cold sensitivity; deep psoric constitution

rubric: Aversion to sun but desires heat
modality: Dislikes sunlight on face but prefers warmth on body
notes: Typical in hormonal imbalances or headaches

rubric: Chilly but aversion to warm room

notes: Seen in emotionally sensitive or hormonal patients

rubric: Heat flushes with perspiration

rubric: Complaints from sudden temperature change

notes: Seen in colds, neuralgia, and emotional shocks

rubric: Feels heat internally but skin is cold
modality: Sensation of internal burning with outward chill

rubric: Complaints during change of season
modality: Worse from climate shift, especially from warm to cold

rubric: Wants cold things during fever

notes: Contradictory state; heat outside, chill inside

rubric: Heat with throbbing pulse and congestion

rubric: Alternating coldness and heat in body

rubric: Chilly patient even in summer

rubric: Burning sensation in soles at night

rubric: Worse from sudden chill when overheated

rubric: Flushed heat in evening, especially face

rubric: Heat internally with cold sweat

rubric: Better from hot applications

rubric: Complaints in early morning cold air

rubric: Wants warm clothes even when room is warm

rubric: Intolerant to both heat and cold

rubric: Feels heat only in localized areas (e.g., vertex, palms)

rubric: Sweats on slightest exertion with coldness

rubric: One part hot, another cold

rubric: Sensitive to temperature changes during menstruation

rubric: Feels cold when undressing

rubric: Complaints from cold bathing
modality: Cold water exposure brings on or worsens symptoms

rubric: Burning heat in palms and soles in evening
modality: Worse in bed, must uncover or place on cold surface
notes: Seen in diabetes, liver disorders, menopause

rubric: Worse from cold feet

rubric: Flashes of heat followed by chill

rubric: Sweats without heat

rubric: Head hot, body cold in fever

rubric: Chilliness with desire to lie down

rubric: Fever with aversion to warmth

rubric: Chilly after eating
modality: Sensation of internal cold after meals

rubric: Chill with dry skin and thirstlessness

rubric: Heat with restlessness and anxiety

rubric: Hot face with cold extremities

rubric: Feels hot but skin remains cold

rubric: Wants to be covered during sweat

rubric: Wants windows open even in winter
modality: Better from fresh air and drafts
notes: Mentally and physically aggravated in closed spaces

rubric: Heat alternates with chills frequently
modality: Changeable thermal state during illness
notes: Seen in intermittent fevers, nervous conditions

rubric: Complaints worse from suppressed perspiration

rubric: Hot head, cold hands and feet in children

rubric: Wants to sleep uncovered despite being chilly
modality: Patient uncovers instinctively even when cold

rubric: Profuse offensive perspiration with chilliness

rubric: Wants hot food and drinks regardless of external heat
modality: Feels better after warm intake even in hot weather

rubric: Head feels hot with red face, rest of body cold

rubric: Cold perspiration on forehead

rubric: Desire for fanning or to be fanned

rubric: Worse from sudden exposure to air after heat

rubric: Complaints aggravated in summer heat
modality: Symptoms worse in heat, sun, or warm weather
notes: Applies to skin, headache, blood pressure, and digestive issues

rubric: Aversion to cold weather
modality: Avoids winter, draft, and cold wind
notes: Chilly diathesis with poor immune defense

rubric: Aversion to hot weather
modality: Worse in summer, sun, or heat exposure
notes: Skin, headache, mental irritation worsens in heat

rubric: Coldness of single parts (e.g., nose, fingers)
modality: Localized chill even when body is warm

rubric: Chill begins in back or between shoulder blades

rubric: Chill worse from uncovering

rubric: Heat ascends from feet to head

rubric: Feels cold but cannot bear covering

rubric: Complaints after chilling feet

rubric: Sweating easily from slightest motion

notes: Seen in anemia, endocrine issues, low stamina cases

rubric: Internal coldness with warm skin

rubric: Heat in vertex of head

rubric: Hot perspiration, offensive or sour

rubric: Chill with trembling and desire for warmth

rubric: Wants to be covered head to toe

rubric: Feels as if heat is rising up the spine

rubric: Coldness of stomach region

rubric: Face hot, body cold
modality: Seen during fever or emotional excitement
notes: Circulatory imbalance; typical in sensitive children

rubric: Chilly and wants hot drinks

notes: Classical symptom in digestive or febrile conditions

rubric: Burning in palms and soles with desire to uncover

rubric: Worse from bathing or exposure to water (thermally)

rubric: Burning internally with icy coldness externally
modality: Feels burning heat inside but body is cold to touch

rubric: Coldness alternating with heat in waves

rubric: Chill comes on from slightest uncovering

rubric: Heat from least motion or exertion

rubric: Feels as if hot air is blowing on them

rubric: Coldness of nose tip

rubric: Desires warmth but heat aggravates

rubric: Face and head hot, limbs icy cold

rubric: Aversion to covering despite chill
modality: Desires to be uncovered even if trembling
notes: Collapse or toxic states with lost thermal regulation

rubric: Burning of feet at night uncovers them

rubric: Chill ascending from feet

rubric: Wants to keep hands and feet uncovered
modality: Feels heat or burning, especially in limbs

rubric: Chill with desire to be fanned

rubric: Heat with redness and throbbing

rubric: Coldness in single fingers or toes

rubric: Profuse sweat on scalp during sleep

rubric: Wants to lie on cold floor during fever

rubric: Internal heat with cold extremities

rubric: Chill worse in a warm room

rubric: Burning sensation with aversion to heat

rubric: Feels hot but skin is dry and burning

rubric: Cold feeling in bones

rubric: Wants cold drinks during chill

rubric: Heat localized to face or head

rubric: Chill worse from touch or pressure

rubric: Heat with desire to stretch or move limbs

rubric: Fever with no thirst and profuse sweat

rubric: One hand hot, the other cold

rubric: Icy cold sweat on limbs
modality: Collapse state; limbs cold, bathed in sweat
notes: Critical rubric in cholera, collapse, shock, or end stage disease

rubric: Chill alternating with heat without perspiration

rubric: Burning in back or between shoulder blades

rubric: Wants cold compress on head during heat
modality: Head heat unbearable; cold gives relief

rubric: Chill with blueness of extremities

rubric: Head feels cold during fever

rubric: Heat confined to palms and soles

rubric: Wants cold air directly on body

rubric: Heat during sleep without waking

rubric: Chill after urination
